website_summaries.verdict: A motorcycle battery that lasts 1,000 charges or more.
pros: Chrome case ensures the motorcycle battery is resistant to shocks, vibrations, and heat
Includes heavy-duty terminals designed to withstand wear, pressure, and torquing
cons: Terminals may be too large for some motorcycle connectors

customer_reviews.title: Supplied nuts don't fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I had a hell of a time installing this because the nuts that come with it are too small. The center of the holes of the nuts sit in the line with the bottom edge of the holes on the terminal. The nuts are too thin, as well, and so, trying to thread on the supplied bolts pushes the nuts out of reach. I basically had to jam a flat head screwdriver under the nut, then jam another flat-head screwdriver behind the nut in order to get the terminal bolts to thread. Poor design. And no, this isn't typical...my other motorcycle batteries don't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Noneofyour DamnBusiness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 95 Suzuki Dr 350SE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 95 Suzuki Dr 350SE. Nice cranking power. I agree with other reviewers on the included screws... about 3mm too short to catch the threads, even though I have a very thin stainless steel battery bracket on my bike, Just take 2 small screwdrivers (realy small, like for electronics screws), one on each side, to hold the nut up. Or jam a small piece of wood or a piece of matchbook in there. We'll see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Bashan brozz 250 replacement, kind of.
customer_reviews.text: Comes precharged which is great. I could not find an exact replacement battery for the bashan brozz 250. This worked just fine with some modification to the battery cage. I just had to cut the cage a bit and squeeze this battery in but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: This was the best deal I could find on the internet (that included prime delivery) Got it for my 2008 Honda Rebel and seems to be performing fine. Delivered on time. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 1984 Yamaha RZ350
customer_reviews.text: This battery fits the '84 RZ350. It is a bit tall, making it a little difficult to connect my battery tender but, all in all, it does the job. I cannot rate durability or longevity, having purchased it only recently.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit, can't return
customer_reviews.text: When I first put in the year, make and model, the website said this battery would fit my motorcycle. Why else would I buy it? When trying to install it, turns out it doesn't fit and conveniently, the site says it doesn't fit either. You think you'd be able to return it but because it requires "special handling" you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Thuy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2007 Kawasaki Ninja 250cc - It fit perfectly, my bike started right up, and it even came with the hardware, replacing my old ones. Love this and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Demagoguer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: this battery arrived well packaged and in good shape , it was also charged and started my suzuki 250 imideitely , so far it is working good however a similar battery bought last year didnt even last 1 year, the limited 3 month warranty is the shortest i have ever seen
customer_reviews.author: Captain Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the price was half of what the stock yusa battery costs. Also the battery was fully charged as advertised, I expected to have to charge it some before use but it wasn't needed. Specs were right on, all in all happy with purchase and would purchase again, only time will tell if its durable.
customer_reviews.author: 1fastvic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect value for dollar. I put it in my CRF250L just to sell and it installed smooth. It does come will the screws and bolt for the terminals!
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Have a 2013 Honda Cbr250r, battery works so far but the terminals were too big for the connectors. Will update if anything goes wrong, otherwise everything should be good!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This product has about 300 starts on it already. Price was well below what walmart or rural king wanted for a similar battery. Fit perfectly in the 4 wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: renfeh07

customer_reviews.title: A great battery at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new battery and they were almost double the price locally, if I could even find on to fit my bike. This was delivered quickly and worked great right out of the box. No need to pre-charge or mix any chemicals, etc. It's only been a couple of weeks but my bikes fired fine on two of the coldest days of the year so far for us(mid-twenties)
customer_reviews.author: Bert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My motorcycle was hit by a drunk driver on new years while I was out of town. I went to see if it stared and sure enough it did. Battery survived the crash, and the bike's fixed now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2010 Honda Elite Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2010 Honda Elite perfectly and fires right up. Only time will tell if it can match the 8 years my OEM battery lasted. My only gripe is that the bolts to hold the screws and the leads took some finagling to catch the threads, but once in it wasn’t a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tortious

customer_reviews.title: Fit chart is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Ordered using the fit chart - battery was to large to fit in the motorcycle's battery location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits and is what I expected. I expect to last at least a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cody

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long and does not recharge.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this battery for about a year. In winter I had kept it for recharge. It does not recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh Pachawa

customer_reviews.title: Let there be power!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits right in, bike starts right up, haven't had a single problem with it! Though amazon says otherwise, this battery DOES fit and work for the 88-07 model year Ninja250.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2005 rebel 250
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 2005 rebel 250. Started the bike right up right out of the box. Only time will tell how durable and long lasting it is, but for the price, I’d be totally happy with a year (the bike is super easy to push start). Shipping was faster than what i was originally quoted too, by about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with the price being so low, but the battery is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Fits my crf250l
customer_reviews.text: It's a battery, it fit and worked. What else ya want?
customer_reviews.author: ElevatorDave

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I just had this for two months and it’s already not working. After 1 day of use, there is no voltage on the battery and it wouldn’t even charge anymore and stays at 11.5 volts.
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa

customer_reviews.title: Installed on my 02 honda nighthawk 250 and works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 02 honda nighthawk 250 and works great so far. Was ready to go when it arrived and has kept up its charge quite well so far.
customer_reviews.author: faten

customer_reviews.title: Works great on 2002 Kawasaki Ninja 250r
customer_reviews.text: Bought this battery for my 02 Ninja and it works great. Comes with the screws and bolts you will need to hook it up and already charged and filed with the acid to go! So all you literally have to do is swap out old, put in new - then screw!
customer_reviews.author: Tru_Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I had to use the nuts from my old battery to secure the battery terminals, because the ones provided were to large to fit the terminals. Not a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Monfils

customer_reviews.title: ... was exactly what I thought it was and worked perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I thought it was and worked perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Wait ,& see
customer_reviews.text: Attractive price, it fits & starts my bike. I'm using a battery tends so time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price works fine. Highly recommend for a budget bike.
customer_reviews.author: ray mojica

customer_reviews.title: so far it works great. Time will tell if it holds up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this battery based on price, so far it works great. Time will tell if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Raser

customer_reviews.title: Not for CTX700
customer_reviews.text: Better not buy this for a Honda CTX700N DCT ABS. The info on this site says it fits, but it doesn't. Too small, and not the right amperage.
customer_reviews.author: jerryreliable

product_meta.title: Rechargeable YTX7L-BS Replacement Motorcycle Battery - Maintenance Free - Sealed Absorbed Glass Mat - Zipp Battery
feature_bullets: BATTERY TYPE: YTX7L-BS AGM battery with [- +] terminal is a rechargeable, power sport battery. 5. 12x 4. 45x 2. 76
VERSATILE FIT: This YTX7L-BS battery fits in a variety of applications, ranging from motorcycles, ATVs, jet skis, and more

TOP TECHNOLOGY: The Acid inside is constructed with Absorbed Glass Mat technology allowing for a low-maintenance and spill proof battery, Patented sealed post prevents corrosion, which gives extended battery life
EASY APPLICATION: Zipp Battery batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered, Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go

specifications.OEM Part Number: CTX7L-BS, GTX7L-BS, LTX7L-BS, M327BS, PTX7L-BS, UB7L-B, UTX7L, EX-TX7L, EBX7L-BS
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
